quote: You crave chaos. You're happiest when the world is in an uproar. You thrive on madness. Even when your magic is at its best when it's the catalyst to confusion. You still can't admit this?
quote_letters: YOU CRAVE CHAOS YOURE HAPPIEST WHEN THE WORLD IS IN AN UPROAR YOU THRIVE ON MADNESS EVEN WHEN YOUR MAGIC IS AT ITS BEST WHEN ITS THE CATALYST TO CONFUSION YOU STILL CANT ADMIT THIS
